questions.question: Fill in the blank: Yo ____ español. (hablar)
questions.explanation: For -ar verbs in the present tense, the yo form ends in -o.

questions.question: What is the present tense of "comer" for ellos?
questions.explanation: For -er verbs in the present tense, the ellos/ellas/ustedes form ends in -en.

questions.question: Fill in the blank: Tú ____ la película ayer. (ver)
questions.explanation: The preterite tense ending for -er/-ir verbs in the tú form is -iste.

questions.question: What is the preterite tense of "hablar" for ellos?
questions.explanation: The preterite tense ending for -ar verbs in the ellos/ellas/ustedes form is -aron.

questions.question: What is the correct stem change for "pensar" in the present tense (yo)?
questions.explanation: Pensar follows the e → ie stem change pattern in all forms except nosotros/vosotros.

questions.question: Choose the correct form: Ella ____ a las 8. (dormir)
questions.explanation: Dormir follows the o → ue stem change pattern in all forms except nosotros/vosotros.
